channel.title: Personal Projects on Franz Louis Cesista
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Projects on Franz Louis Cesista

item.title: Multimodal Structured Generation
item.description: Generate interleaved text and image content in a structured format you can directly pass to downstream APIs.

item.title: Flash Hyperbolic Attention Minimal [WIP]
item.description: A minimal implementation of Flash Attention 1 & 2 in just ~350 lines of CUDA code. This is still a work-in-progress, but the ultimate goal is to implement the various variations of Hyperbolic Attention in CUDA.

item.title: Llama.cpp
item.description: A C++ implementation of Meta's Llama2 generative large-language model. I also optimized the original C implementation by Karpathy by adding parallelization on the multi-head attention layer.

item.title: Expedock Assistant: ChatGPT Applied to Logistics Data
item.description: Expedock Assistant is a chatbot that allows you to ask questions about your shipments and get answers in real time. Itâ€™s like having a personal assistant that knows everything about your business, shipments and industry.

item.title: Expedock AutoML
item.description: Expedock's AutoML Library -- fit a model, run batch inference, and get explanations in one line of code each.

item.title: Booking Demand Prediction for Grab SEA
item.description: Booking demand prediction for Grab's Southeast Asia operations. The project involves spatio-temporal forecasting, anomaly detection, and econometric modeling.

item.title: Codeball 2018
item.description: My entry for the World Finals of the Russian AI Cup 2018 - Codeball. A 3D physics-aware orchestrator of a pair of bots in a Rocket League-esque soccer game.

item.title: Codewars 2017
item.description: My entry for the World Finals of the Russian AI Cup 2017 - Codewars. A particle swarm-based AI that uses potential flows and fluid mechanics to direct units in a Command-and-Conquer-esque game.

item.title: Ateneo's Competitive Programming Varsity's Code Library
item.description: A collection of algorithms, data structures and other useful information for competitive programming. Used and maintained by members of the Ateneo de Manila University Programming Varsity.
